Sure, here is an exhaustive list of tools and equipment that you may need for a single real fruit ice cream shop:

1. Freezers: You will need a commercial grade freezer or a combination of freezers to store your ice cream mix, toppings and other ingredients.
2. Ice cream maker: You will need an ice cream maker to make your own ice cream mix.
3. Blender or food processor: You will need a blender or food processor to blend your fruits and other ingredients.
4. Mixing bowls: You will need a set of mixing bowls to mix your ice cream ingredients.
5. Spatulas, whisks, and ladles: You will need these tools to mix and scoop the ice cream.
6. Ice cream scoops: You will need these to portion out the ice cream.
7. Display cabinets: You will need a display cabinet to showcase your ice cream.
8. Point of Sale system: You will need a POS system to handle transactions with your customers.
9. Refrigerator : You will need a refrigerator to store fruits, toppings and other ingredients.
10. Cleaning supplies: You will need cleaning supplies such as sanitizers, cleaning agents, and rags to keep the equipment and the shop clean.
11. Cash Register or Cash Drawer : You will need a cash register or a cash drawer to keep the cash.
12. Credit Card Reader : You will need a credit card reader if you want to accept credit card payments.
13. Scale : You will need a scale to measure the ingredients.
14. Measuring cups and spoons : You will need measuring cups and spoons to measure the ingredients.
15. Food thermometer : You will need a thermometer to check the temperature of the ice cream mixture.
16. Ice cream cups and spoons : You will need cups and spoons to serve the ice cream.
17. Food safety gloves : you will need gloves to protect your hands from cold and also maintaining the hygiene.
18. Ice cream cones and waffle cups : you will need cones and waffle cups for serving the ice cream.
